subject: New review (5★) of Simsonn Pro Pedals and Pro Plus Pedals Upgrade Kit (from Brian A.)
description_text:
Rating: 5 | Review Text: This upgrade is awesome! Improves the feel of the pedals immensely. The new dampers really do feel more realistic, and the brake stack up is a huge improvement.
When I first opened the package, I was a little intimidated by the number of parts included (no instructions are provided). However, once I began disassembling the pedals and looking at how all the bearings, spacers, etc. are arranged, it was easy to figure out how the new parts fit in.
It's amazing that Simsonn is selling this as an upgrade package!
